content: Greetings all!We just launched our KVAULT - a Distributed Trust Treasury Vault that provides a secure and viable alternative to Stablecoins, Bank savings accounts and reserve tokens. The unique feature is that it offers a guarantee of the funds based on a range of real-world assets that do not lose value regardless of the situation. Unique benefits:1. 5% APY without any trading risk2. Proprietary Distributed Trust Mechanism: You retain ownership of the funds - legally and operationally.3. Legally compliant solution - EU and the UK4. Secured by real and liquid (turned into cash immediately) assets. This is the safest placement you can find if you are looking to secure your funds with the lowest risk while getting a realistically excellent yield. * The minimum placement is $2500 and the maximum is $7500. * The first KVAULT issue is at $450.000 for 6 months and offers a 4.5% APY with a bonus of 1.5% for the first 150 Retail investors who will lock their funds. Check it out today: https://vault.kratos-x.eu
